item.description:
@ -1,37 +1,38 @@

Leave the homepage title empty to use the site title

title: date: 2022-10-24 type: landing

sections:

  • block: markdown design: columns: ‘2’ content: title: Research text: “I am interested in human-on-the-loop autonomous systems. These software-intensive systems make a lot of decisions autonomously. To enable successful human-machine collaboration, humans need to understand the decisions that are made by these systems. Humans also need to be able to express their own needs in a way that machines understand.

My research focuses on the following questions:

  • How can we (continuously) elicit preferences and goals that people deem important in autonomous systems? [ ]

  • How can quality tradeoffs be explained to humans, so that it is easier to understand how systems behave? [ ]

  • How can systems be monitored to ensure that safety and security constraints are fulfilled, but so that we can reduce energy consumption and required bandwidth? [ ]

Grants and Awards

  • 2023: .

  • 2023: .

  • 2023: : Funding for my own position, as well as 2 PhD students and 2 postdocs.

  • 2023: Best Paper Award at .

  • 2019: Best Paper Award at .

  • 2019: Best Paper Award at .

item.title: News
item.description:
[August 2024] I will be serving on the program committee for .

[August 2024] My new PhD student Matei Schiopu is starting this month. Welcome to our group! :)

[August 2024] I will be serving on the program committee for .

[July 2024] Paper accepted at AI4AS. More information can be found .

[July 2024] Papers accepted at and .

[June 2024] Paper accepted at ECSA'24. More information about the paper can be found .

[May 2024] accepted to the .

[May 2024] Paper accepted at . The preprint can be found .

[April 2024] Paper accepted at . More information about the paper can be found .

[April 2024] My new postdoc Raffaela Groner has started. Welcome to Sweden and to our group! :)

[March 2024] I gave a talk at the seminar series of - a Center for Trustworthy Edge Computing Systems and Applications at KTH in Stockholm.

[February 2024] We got a paper accepted at . It is called .

[February 2024] Paper accepted at . You can find a preprint .

[January 2024] Paper accepted at Designing, a workshop at ICSE. You can find more information .

[January 2024] I got the !

[January 2024] Two new papers are accepted for publication in IEEE Software. focuses on our techniques to explain quality tradeoffs, which we applied in several open source projects and companies. deals with what “continuous compliance” is and how it can be achieved in the automotive industry.

[December 2023] I’m hiring a postdoc. You can find the announcement . The deadline is on January 24, 2024.

[December 2023] I’m hiring up to two new PhD students. is the announcement with more information and a link to the application portal. You can apply until January 10. Looking forward to great applications!

[October 2023] The proposal for our was accepted. It is called ShiftLeft: Securing the Software Supply Chain by Code-centric Analysis.

[October 2023] I am going to be a workshop co-chair at . Looking forward to great workshop proposals!

[October 2023] I served as the external reviewer/ at Raquel Ouriques’s PhD defense at Blekinge Tekniska Högskola.

[September 2023] Andres Diaz-Pace, David Garlan, and I won the Best Paper Award for our !

[September 2023] I’ve accepted to serve on the program committee for the Artifact Track of .

[August 2023] I will be on the program committee for .

[June 2023] Our paper was accepted. It is called “Supporting the Exploration of Quality Attribute Tradeoffs in Large Design Spaces” (with Andres Diaz Pace and David Garlan).

[April 2023] I am going to receive the IT Faculty . So grateful for the recognition!

[March 2023] My grant application for a WASP academic PhD project was accepted. It is about requirements conflict resolution for self-adaptive systems. I will be hiring a PhD student soon.

[March 2023] I’m hiring a PhD student in Software Engineering for Human-Centric Autonomous Systems. You can find more information and apply until April 14 . Please spread the word!

[March 2023] Our paper “Investigating Software Engineering Artifacts in DevOps Through the Lens of Boundary Objects” was accepted. It is joined work with Christoph Matthies and Robert Heinrich.

[January 2023] The course that I redesigned and taught last semester got a really good course evaluation. It was a BSc-level course on software processes.

[November 2022] Javier Cámara, Bradley Schmerl, David Garlan, and I got a paper accepted to the Journal of Systems and Software (JSS). It is called “ExTrA: Explaining Architectural Design Tradeoff Spaces via Dimensionality Reduction”.

[October 2022] I will give a talk at the later this month (Oct 20). Come and join if you’re in Gothenburg!

[October 2022] A new article about my research and career has been published on the .

[October 2022] Our paper got accepted to the . You can find a preprint .

[September 2022] I will be serving on the program committee for . We’re looking forward to your submissions!

[September 2022] Very happy that our paper got accepted to the Journal of Systems and Software (JSS). It is based on a collaboration with Michael Vierhauser, Marco Stadler, and Jane Cleland-Huang. A preprint can be found .

[September 2022] Our paper got accepted to the Conference on Communications and Network Security (CNS): Cyber Resilience Workshop (with Michael Vierhauser and Stefan Rass).

[July 2022] I will be serving on the program committees for and .

[June 2022] After two great years at CMU, I will be starting as an Assistant Professor at Chalmers University of Technology in August 2022. Very happy about this new position and I’m looking forward to returning to Sweden!

[April 2022] I will be serving on the program committee for .

[March 2022] Our paper got accepted: . You can find the preprint .

[December 2021] I’ve accepted to serve as a PC Co-Chair for the Industry Track at .

[November 2021] Our journal paper got accepted to . It’s an invited extension of our . Check out the preprint !

[September 2021] I have accepted to serve on the program committees for and the .

[August 2021] I will be on the program committee for . I also accepted to serve as a Co-Chair of the Poster and Tool Demo track at . We’re looking forward to your submissions.

[April 2021] I have accepted to serve as the publication co-chair for .

[March 2021] ICSA was a lot of fun. We had great discussions on our two papers and I chaired an interesting session on architecture evolution. I also got an award for being the best player at the conference - what an honor! :)

[January 2021] We got an paper accepted: .

[January 2021] Our submission of a journal-first paper to has been accepted. Stay tuned for our upcoming presentation on , published in IEEE Software.

[January 2021] I have accepted to serve as the proceedings chair for . We’ll be looking forward to your submissions!

[January 2021] Our paper on got accepted to the International Working Conference on Requirement Engineering: Foundation for Software Quality ( ). Preprint .

[January 2021] Happy new year! I’m adding this news section to keep you informed about my research.
